data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Animals lose water through their skin and lungs, in the faeces and urine. These ____ must ____ made ____ by ____ in ____ and ____ and ____ the ____ that ____ a by-product of ____ reactions. If the animal does not manage to compensate for water loss the dissolved substances in the blood may become so concentrated they become lethal.
data.partBlankContent: Animals lose water through their skin and lungs, in the faeces and urine. These los___ must b_ made u_ by wa___ in fo__ and dr___ and fr__ the wa___ that i_ a by-product of chem____ reactions. If the animal does not manage to compensate for water loss the dissolved substances in the blood may become so concentrated they become lethal.
data.fullContent: Animals lose water through their skin and lungs, in the faeces and urine. These losses must be made up by water in food and drink and from the water that is a by-product of chemical reactions. If the animal does not manage to compensate for water loss the dissolved substances in the blood may become so concentrated they become lethal.
data.answer: 动物通过皮肤和肺部通过粪便和尿液失去水分。这些损失必须通过食物和饮料中的水以及化学反应的副产品水来弥补。如果动物不能设法弥补水分的流失，那么血液中的溶解物质就会浓缩到致命的程度。
